item.title: The Strategic Relevance of Artificial Intelligence in Contemporary Geopolitics
item.author: jeronimo@sheepdog.dev (Jeronimo de Rossi Molina)
item.description: This policy brief examines the critical role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in reshaping global power dynamics. It highlights AI’s function as both a strategic enabler and a domain of geopolitical contestation, urging the international strategic community to address its implications for security, governance, and the future of the international order.
